snippet: The attack was the second airstrike on a wedding in Yemen in a little over a week, and it added to growing criticism over the coalition’s air campaign.

byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa reported from Sana, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo.
byline.original: By SHUAIB ALMOSAWA and KAREEM FAHIM

abstract: Airstrike by Saudi Arabia-led military coalition to halt insurrection in Yemen kills 23 people attending wedding celebration in Dhamar Province; second fatal airstrike on wedding party in 10 days adds to growing criticism of coalition United Nations says is responsible for over 1,100 civilian deaths in past six months.
lead_paragraph: The attack was the second airstrike on a wedding in Yemen in a little over a week, and it added to growing criticism over the coalition’s air campaign.

headline.print_headline: Air Attacks Said to Kill 23 in Yemen
headline.main: Yemen Airstrike Said to Kill 23 at a Wedding
